articles.description: Follow live text updates of Chris Eubank vs Conor Benn press conference at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium before their fight this Saturday.
articles.title: Eubank vs Benn press conference LIVE: Watch and follow text commentary

articles.description: Described as Leicester City's "greatest ever player", when Jamie Vardy departs, he will leave a legacy at the club he has served so well since his arrival 13 years ago.
articles.title: Jamie Vardy: Leicester City Premier League title winner will leave a legacy

articles.description: NBA legend Jason Kidd joins Everton's American ownership group, say the Premier League club.
articles.title: Jason Kidd joins Everton ownership group: Former NBA player is coach of Dallas Mavericks

articles.description: Follow live action & updates from the 2025 World Snooker Championship taking centre stage at the iconic Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025 LIVE: Mark Selby, Mark Allen, Luca Brecel & John Higgins in action on day six

articles.description: Iga Swiatek avoids another shock defeat against Filipina teenager Alexandra Eala by fighting back to win their Madrid Open first-round match.
articles.title: Madrid Open 2025: Iga Swiatek beats Alexandra Eala to avoid Miami repeat

articles.description: West Ham manager Graham Potter believes Niclas Fullkrug's recent outburst was not "helpful to the club" and would prefer players to voice concerns privately.
articles.title: West Ham: Niclas Fullkrug outburst 'not helpful', says Graham Potter

articles.description: Former world champion Luca Brecel fights back from 5-1 down to beat Ryan Day 10-7 and move into the last 16 of the 2025 World Championship at the Crucible.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship: Luca Brecel beats Ryan Day with comeback in first round

articles.description: Manchester United will be one of the eight clubs competing in the inaugural Women's World Sevens tournament in May.
articles.title: Man Utd one of eight clubs entering new World Sevens tournament

articles.description: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe is back at work after a stay in hospital with pneumonia.
articles.title: Eddie Howe: Newcastle manager returns to work after hospital stay

articles.description: Ruud van Nistelrooy says he is still waiting to find out from the owners if he will keep his job as Leicester City manager.
articles.title: Ruud van Nistelrooy: Leicester City manager still unsure whether he will keep his job
